title: pandas dataframe conversion into sktime dataframe[BUG]
body:
**Describe the bug**
<!--I have attached the data format, it is CSV file , first column is id column and then from jan-16 to Dec-16, it is monthly electricity consumption of Con_1 to Con-11(11 different consumers) in the end their is target which describe  either customer is healthy or theft.
![sampledataimage](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/64782359/97338031-f0a18400-18bb-11eb-8edb-3a7140417bff.PNG)

Problem: Is this when i am trying to fit this file through sktime tabularize function it is through error, can you tell me how to convert standard csv file format into sktime readable format
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.
-->
I have attached the data format, it is CSV file , first column is id column and then from jan-16 to Dec-16, it is monthly electricity consumption of Con_1 to Con-11(11 different consumers) in the end their is target which describe  either customer is healthy or theft.
df = pd.read_csv("data_file.csv")
df.head()
![sampledataimage](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/64782359/97338031-f0a18400-18bb-11eb-8edb-3a7140417bff.PNG)
I want to represent my data into this file format, can you help me.
I am trying to resolve this from past seven days please help me
![sktime](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/64782359/97339420-87227500-18bd-11eb-8dd6-39c86aca0c28.PNG)
